{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/sro/change-settings": { "created": "20170322105507933", "text": "! Settings These settings let you customise the view and sidebar layout of TiddlyWiki {{$:/snippets/viewswitcher}} {{$:/plugins/tg/sro/sidebar-layout}} --- {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/change-settings", "tags": "$:/tags/publish", "modified": "20200318114153795", "caption": "Settings" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/help": { "text": "! Help Before you 'publish' your ~TiddlyWiki: # Make a backup of your wiki # Get a defined start-up situation for your TW: #* Define your starting tiddler(s) in [[$:/DefaultTiddlers]] #* If required, define the state of the sidebar and the sidebar tabs #* If required create a tiddler (e.g. `xyz`) which transcludes $:/plugins/tg/sro/publish to create another option to return from readonly to edit mode #* If required change the keyboard shortut (Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P) for opening $:/plugins/tg/sro/publish via Control Panel > Keyboard Shortcuts # Click the button ''Hide buttons & tabs'' in tab ''Buttons and sidebar tabs'' # Adjust ''Settings'' in tab ''Settings'' # Save in tab ''Save'' with the special save button: @@.BLUE ''Save''@@ {{$:/plugins/tg/sro/save-button}} # Reload your wiki There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode: # Press the configured keyboard shortcut (default Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P), which opens $:/plugins/tg/sro/publish # Start the TW with `#xyz` appended which opens $:/plugins/tg/sro/publish # Search for: #* ''Publish'' to get to $:/plugins/tg/sro/publish #* ''~ControlPanel'' to get to ''$:/ControlPanel > Appearance > Publish'' <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/help", "tags": "$:/tags/publish", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20200925155146153", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170322105540899", "caption": "Help" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/hide-buttons-tabs": { "text": "! Buttons & sidebar tabs <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish-button" tags="-$:/tags/TopRightBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/readonly-styles" tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/search" tags="$:/tags/SideBarSegment"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable" text="no"/> Hide buttons & tabs <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish-button" tags="$:/tags/TopRightBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/readonly-styles" tags="-$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/sro/search" tags="-$:/tags/SideBarSegment"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable" text="yes"/> Show buttons & tabs <<< ''Note:''
<> <<< ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/hide-buttons-tabs", "tags": "$:/tags/publish", "modified": "20200925160943100", "created": "20170322105628418", "caption": "Buttons & sidebar tabs" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/icon": { "created": "20170322105647495", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230124255626" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/image-save-button": { "created": "20170322105709315", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/image-save-button", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230124312849", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/images/publish": { "created": "20170322105731731", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/images/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230124356911" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/license": { "created": "20180124175247498", "text": "[[Simple readonly plugin|http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/#Simple%20readonly%20plugin]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2020 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230124416664" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/predefined-buttons-tabs": { "text": "@@.sliderBG
!!!     Buttons # Page toolbar #* New button #* Control panel button #* Save button # View toolbar #* Edit button #* More button #* Info button # Edit toolbar #* Delete button #* Cancel button #* Done button # Top toolbar #* Sidebar button (to switch Sidebar) ^^''1''^^ #* Publish button (opens menu for hiding/showing/saving tabs & buttons) ^^''2''^^ # Search #* Advanced search button (next to Search) ^^''1''^^ !!!   Sidebar tabs * Open * Recent * Tools * More * ...   ^^''1''^^ ''Sidebar button and Advanced search button will be hidden, but they stay active!''
  ^^''2''^^ ''Publish button will be hidden as well (not active!)''.
@@ ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/predefined-buttons-tabs", "tags": "", "modified": "20200925155045992", "created": "20170322105829625" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish": { "text": "!! Simple readonly plugin <>", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "modified": "20200925152026099", "created": "20170322105850884", "caption": "Publish" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish-button": { "text": "<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Publish simple read-only"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish" height="700px" width="500px"/> {{$:/plugins/tg/sro/images/publish}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish-button", "tags": "$:/tags/TopRightBar -$:/tags/TopRightBar", "modified": "20200925155609600", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu", "created": "20170322105910944" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/readme": { "created": "20170322105934099", "text": "A plugin to make ~TiddlyWiki read-only.
You can hide - by clicking one button - a set of <> and save this situation. Click the Publish button <> next to the sidebar button <>/<> to start making your TW 'publish-ready'. A new window with four tabs opens. <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode, see [[Help|$:/plugins/tg/sro/help]]. ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/readme", "tags": "", "modified": "20200323201842302", "caption": "Simple mode" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/readonly-styles": { "text": "/* Readonly styles for buttons */ svg.tc-image-new-button, svg.tc-image-options-button, svg.tc-image-save-button, svg.tc-image-edit-button, svg.tc-image-delete-button, svg.tc-image-cancel-button, svg.tc-image-done-button, svg.tc-image-down-arrow, svg.tc-image-info-button, svg.tc-image-chevron-right, svg.tc-image-chevron-left, svg.tgc-publish-sro { display: none; } /* Hide advanced search button */ .tc-image-advanced-search-button.tc-image-button { padding-left: 15px; } .tc-sidebar-lists { display: none; } ", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/readonly-styles", "tags": "", "modified": "20200925155609601", "list-after": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base", "created": "20170322105952964" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/save": { "created": "20170322110010997", "text": "! Save {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Saving}} @@.BLUE ''Save''@@ {{$:/plugins/tg/sro/save-button}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/save", "tags": "$:/tags/publish", "modified": "20200318114131041", "caption": "Save" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/save-button": { "created": "20170405200808621", "text": "<$button message="tm-save-wiki" param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}}> {{$:/plugins/tg/sro/image-save-button}} ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/save-button", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230124759843", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/search": { "text": "
<$set name="searchTiddler" value="$:/temp/search">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/search" type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-popup-handle"/> <$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text={{$:/temp/search}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text=""/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/search" text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[{$:/temp/search}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="searchTerm" value={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter="[!is[system]search]"/>"""> {{$:/language/Search/Matches}} <$reveal state="$:/temp/search" type="match" text=""> <$button to="$:/AdvancedSearch" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/AdvancedSearch/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown-wrapper" state="$:/temp/search" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-search-drop-down tc-popup-handle" state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default=""> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/search}minlength{$:/config/Search/MinLength}limit[1]]" emptyMessage="""
{{$:/language/Search/Search/TooShort}}
""" variable="listItem"> {{$:/core/ui/SearchResults}}
", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/search", "tags": "", "modified": "20200925155609603", "created": "20181221200154739" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/sidebar-layout": { "created": "20170322110052858", "text": "\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/ Sidebar layout: <$select tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout"> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/sidebar-layout", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230124849067" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/slider-macro": { "created": "20170322110111515", "text": "\define slidertg(label,text) <$button popup="$:/state/$label$" class="tc-btn-invisible tgc-slider"><$text text="$label$ »"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state="$:/state/$label$" animate="yes"> {{$text$}} \end", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/slider-macro", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20191230124912497" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/styles": { "created": "20170322110126226", "text": "/* Slider style */ html .tgc-slider { color: #5778D8; font-weight: bold; } .tgc-slider:hover { color: #5778D8; text-decoration: underline; } .sliderBG { color: #000080; background-color: #F7FAFF; } .RED { color: red; font-weight: bold; } .BLUE { color: blue; font-weight: bold; }", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20191230124931037" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/macros/doc": { "text": "\define icn(icon) \end", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/macros/doc", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20200316124655912", "created": "20200316124557084" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish": { "created": "20200318124157969", "text": "Open Publish window", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20200318124228751" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/publish": { "created": "20200318124115057", "text": "ctrl-shift-alt-P", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20200318124135106" }, "$:/plugins/tg/sro/shortcut/publish": { "created": "20200323202318023", "text": "<$navigator story="$:/StoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="$:/plugins/tg/sro/publish"/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/sro/shortcut/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "modified": "20200323202630736", "key": "((publish))" } } }
author: TonGerner
name: Makes TW readonly
title: $:/plugins/tg/sro
